Evil is whatever distracts.
We've got to live, no matter how many skies have fallen.
A thing must be loved before it is lovable.
Opportunities multiply as they are seized.
When something comes from within, when it is a part of you, you have no choice but to live it, to express it.
There is no limitations except those we create for ourselves.

Imagination means nothing without doing.
Within every desire is the mechanics of its fulfillment.
Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.

Hope is a waking dream.
We are always complaining that our days are few, and acting as though there would be no end of them.
It's better to have a short life that is full of what you like doing, than a long life spent in a miserable way.
Freedom is the open window through which pours the sunlight of the human spirit and human dignity.
If I persist long enough I will win.
Whatever your mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

Sometimes you have to lose all you have to find out who you truly are.
Truth will always be truth, regardless of lack of understanding, disbelief or ignorance.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice.
You may delay, but time will not.
Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.

Whatever you are, be a good one.

From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
